name: Tunnel Wave (JichenCui)
description:
Tunnel Wave

Tunnel Wave consists of three tunnels with different themes. Each tunnel has a different interactive method. The three tunnel themes are cave tunnel, forest tunnel and music tunnel. The Tunnel Wave aims to complete the magic tunnel triangle pattern and enter the music tunnel. 

In the cave tunnel, there are magic diamonds hidden inside wooden boxes. The player needs to open the right boxes and release the diamonds. By absorbing the magic power from these diamonds, the triangle sign will show up and send the player to the next tunnel. 
The next tunnel is the forest tunnel and magic bubbles are floating in it. Three of the bubbles contains the magic power to draw the tunnel triangle sign. The player needs to prick the bubbles to release the magic power. 
The last tunnel is the music tunnel. In this tunnel, the player just simply enjoys the music and the visualised audio waves.
